Courbes

Points

Est un ensemble de points à afficher sur le graphe.

HTMLJS
 
<chart-html>
    <curve-points>
        [[0,0], [1,1], [2,0]]
    </curve-points>
</chart-html>
 
const graph = new ChartHTML();
graph.addComponent(ChartHTML.Points, {
    content: [[0,0], [1,1], [2,0]]
});
document.body.append(graph.host);
playground playground
